td.p: An unauthorized external mesh fence or metal railing (with or without a solid fence wall as its lower part) (structure) on-grade, but only if the structure—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: falls within the description of paragraphs (a), (b) and (c) of item 2.7 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: does not fall within the description of item 16 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized mesh fence or metal railing (with or without a solid fence wall as its lower part) (structure) on a roof of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the structure falls within the description of paragraphs (c) and (e) of item 2.56 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 and—
the requirement in paragraph (d) of that item is complied with;
if the lower part of the structure is a solid fence wall—

paragraph.name: A
paragraph.content: the wall falls within the description of paragraph (f)(i), (ii) and (iii) of that item; and

paragraph.name: B
paragraph.content: the total length of additional wall per m2 of the roof area is not more than 0.3 m; and
the structure is not a structure falling within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (f) of item 18 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 or paragraph (b); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the structure falls within the description of paragraphs (c) and (e) of item 3.56 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 and—
the requirement in paragraph (d) of that item is complied with;
if the lower part of the structure is a solid fence wall—

paragraph.name: A
paragraph.content: the wall falls within the description of paragraph (f)(i), (ii) and (iii) of that item; and

paragraph.name: B
paragraph.content: the total length of additional wall per m2 of the roof area is not more than 0.3 m; and
the structure is not a structure falling within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (f) of item 18 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized mesh fence or metal railing on top of a solid fence wall (other than an unauthorized solid fence wall) (construction) on-grade, but only if the construction—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: falls within the description of paragraphs (a) and (b) of item 1.59 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is not a construction falling within the description of paragraphs (b) and (c) of item 21 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 or item 11.

td.p: An unauthorized mesh fence or metal railing on top of a solid fence wall (other than an unauthorized solid fence wall and a solid fence wall falling within the description of item 5 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 that was erected, altered or repaired without the approval and consent of the Building Authority under section 14(1) of the Ordinance) (construction) on-grade, but only if the construction—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: falls within the description of paragraphs (a), (b) and (c) of item 2.57 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: does not fall within the description of paragraph (b) of item 21 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized external pole on-grade, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the pole falls within the description of paragraphs (a) and (b) of item 2.53 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: either of the following—
the height of the pole, including any feature at its top, is more than 3 m;
the weight of the pole, including any feature at its top but excluding any pedestal, is more than 100 kg.

td.p: An unauthorized pole on a roof of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the height of the pole, including any feature at its top, is more than 1.5 m but not more than 2.5 m and—
the pole falls within the description of paragraph (d) of item 2.54 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and
the requirements in paragraphs (e) and (f) of that item are complied with; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the height of the pole, including any feature at its top, is not more than 1.5 m and—
the requirements in paragraphs (e) and (f) of that item are complied with; and
the pole is not a pole falling within the description of paragraphs (c) and (d) of item 19 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized metal gate at a fence wall, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: the gate falls within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (e) of item 2.16 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the gate—
falls within the description of paragraphs (c) and (d) of item 3.13 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and
is not a metal gate falling within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (e) of item 8 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized canopy projecting from an external wall of a building over an entrance to the building, but only if the canopy—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: falls within the description of paragraphs (b) and (c) of item 1.27 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is not a canopy falling within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (e) of item 14 of Part 2 of Schedule 2 or item 16.

td.p: An unauthorized canopy projecting from an external wall of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the canopy falls within the description of paragraphs (c) and (d) of item 3.25 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: no part of the canopy projects more than 500 mm from the wall.

td.p: An unauthorized retractable awning for an opening on an external wall of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the opening falls within the description of paragraph (b) of item 2.43 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the awning falls within the description of paragraphs (c), (d), (e), (f) and (g) of that item.

td.p: An unauthorized trellis in a garden on-grade, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: if the trellis is located in a private garden—the aggregate of the area covered by each trellis located in the garden is—
not more than 20 m2; and
not more than 5% of the total area of the garden; and

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: if the trellis is located in a non-private garden—the requirements in paragraph (b)(iv)(A) and (B) of that item are complied with.

td.p: An unauthorized trellis on a roof of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the trellis falls within the description of paragraphs (c), (d) and (e) of item 1.45 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 and—
if the trellis is located in a common part of the building—the requirements in paragraph (f)(i) and (ii) of that item are complied with;
if the trellis is located in a part that is not a common part of the building (non-common part)—the aggregate of the area covered by each trellis located in the non-common part is—

paragraph.name: A
paragraph.content: not more than 20 m2; and

paragraph.name: B
paragraph.content: not more than 5% of the total area of that part; and
the trellis does not fall within the description of paragraph (b); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the trellis falls within the description of paragraphs (c) and (d)(i) and (ii) of item 2.45 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 and—
if the trellis is located in a common part of the building—the requirements in paragraph (d)(iii)(A) and (B) of that item are complied with; and
if the trellis is located in a part that is not a common part of the building—the requirements in paragraph (d)(iv)(A) and (B) of that item are complied with.

td.p: An unauthorized external metal ventilation duct, or an unauthorized supporting frame associated with an external metal ventilation duct, on-grade or on a roof of a building, but only if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the duct or frame—
falls within the description of paragraph (b) of item 2.47 of Part 3 of Schedule 1; and
does not fall within the description of paragraph (b) of item 3.47 of Part 3 of Schedule 1 (item 3.47); or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the duct or frame—
falls within the description of paragraph (b) of item 3.47; and
is not a duct or frame falling within the description of paragraphs (b) and (c) of item 22 of Part 2 of Schedule 2.

td.p: An unauthorized external metal ventilation duct, or an unauthorized supporting frame associated with an external metal ventilation duct, but only if the duct or frame falls within the description of paragraph (a), (b) or (c) of item 3.48 of Part 3 of Schedule 1.
